nse_queries.observation: [Critical - Operational] On Page 132, the Company states its revenue model leverages the "three-year validity cycle of compliance certificates to create revenue streams while optimizing asset utilization through dual-purpose vehicle deployment for both testing and operational requirements." However, the provided financial data for Net Worth, EBITDA, EBITDA Margin, RoE, RoCE, and Debt to EBITDA Ratio for the three fiscal years presented (ending Dec 2024 stub period not provided) do not explicitly demonstrate the revenue generated from the "three-year validity cycle of compliance certificates" or the specific revenue impact of "dual-purpose vehicle deployment." Quantify the revenue generated specifically from the three-year validity cycle of compliance certificates and the incremental revenue derived from dual-purpose vehicle deployment, and provide the corresponding impact on EBITDA and Net Worth. Provide revised draft...
nse_queries.regulation_ref: ICDR Regulations - Disclosure Requirements for Financial Information

nse_queries.observation: [Critical - Operational] On Page 134, the Company presents customer repeat rates as 61.91% (Mar-25), 73.56% (Mar-24), and 92.98% (Mar-23). This indicates a significant decline in repeat business percentage from FY23 to FY25. Provide an analysis of the drivers for this decline and the specific strategies being implemented to reverse this trend and improve customer retention. Provide revised draft...

[Critical - Operational] On Page 150, the "PLANT AND MACHINERY DETAILS" lists various equipment including "Aluminum Mold for the CNG Kit Box," "Roller Bench System," "Fiber Laser Marking Machines," "Barcode Scanners," "V Mark Dot Pin Marking Machine," "Air Conditioners," "Cameras," "Multiple Gas Analyzers," "Leak Detector Testing Equipment," "OBD-II Analyzer & Reader devices," and "Barcode Printers." While the narrative mentions "manufacturing and testing purposes," "precision marking and tracking," and "engraving dates during dispatch to enable us to identify products under warranty," it lacks specific details on the application and operational capacity of these machines in relation to the company's current production volume and projected growth. Provide revised draft...

On page no. 131, it is mentioned insurance disclosures. Kindly clarify by: (a) providing a 3-year comparative table of historical insurance losses vs claims vs excess payouts (₹/%); and (b) assessing adequacy of cover relative to the scale of operations. Provide revised draft and confirm it will be updated in the prospectus.

On page no. 152, it is mentioned CSR activities. Kindly confirm whether the allocated amount was expended and specify the quantum thereof for the past three fiscal years. Further, provide a revised draft along with confirmation that the same will be updated in prospectus

[Critical - Operational] Throughout the Chapter (specifically on Page 144), the disclosure mentions "PT / MAP sensor" and "Cylinder valve with In Built Safety Device". Please clarify the specific industrial/technical jargon used and provide a detailed explanation of their function and relevance to the Company's core business operations, including any proprietary technology or unique application. Confirm that the revised disclosure shall be updated in the Prospectus. Provide revised draft.
nse_queries.regulation_ref: ICDR Regulations - Disclosure Requirements for Risk Factors

nse_queries.observation: On page no. 147, it is mentioned the disclosure regarding subsidiary rationale. Kindly clarify the rationale for the existing corporate structure and the reasons for not undertaking business operations directly through the Issuer Company. Further, provide a revised draft along with confirmation.

On page no. 131, it is mentioned the disclosure regarding logistics mechanism audit. Kindly provide details pertaining to the logistics mechanism of the Company, including the ratio of in-house vs outsourced logistics. Further, provide a revised draft along with confirmation that the same will be updated in prospectus

On page no. 132, quality assurance processes are discussed. Kindly elaborate on the Company’s quality assurance and control mechanisms. If the Company lacks in-house quality certifications, kindly provide the rationale and consider the inclusion of a risk factor. Further, provide a revised draft along with confirmation.

On page no. 131, it is mentioned the disclosure regarding management experience individual. As per drafting norms, kindly provide individual years of experience, specific domain expertise, and prior successful track record for each Key Managerial Personnel (KMP). Avoid generic aggregation. Provide revised draft and confirmation.

[Critical - Operational] Throughout the Chapter (specifically on Page(s) 133), the DRHP highlights "Quality Assurance and Standards" as a competitive strength and details servicing and condition assessment protocols. However, there is no disclosure of actual inspection/rejection rates during the pre-conversion assessment, nor any mention of post-conversion rejection rates or customer complaints related to the performance of converted vehicles. Provide specific metrics on QA inspection/rejection rates at the pre-conversion stage and post-conversion rejection rates or customer complaint data. Provide revised draft...
nse_queries.regulation_ref: ICDR Regulations - Disclosure Requirements for Risk Factors

nse_queries.observation: On page no. 131, it is mentioned the disclosure regarding order book authenticity. On page no. 131, it is mentioned working capital requirements. Kindly provide a detailed rationale for inventory/debtor days being significantly higher/lower than industry peers. Include a 3-year comparative table mapping cash conversion cycle with operating cash flows. Provide revised draft.

nse_queries.observation: On page no. 131, it is mentioned violations/actions. Kindly disclose in detail, all violations and actions taken by statutory or regulatory authorities against the company. Provide revised draft.

[Critical - Legal] Throughout the Chapter (specifically on Page 152), the corporate name and logo are stated as not registered under the Trade Marks Act, 1999, yet an application for the logo was made on January 30, 2025. Clarify the status of this application and the implications of using an unregistered corporate name and logo in marketing activities. Provide revised draft...

On page no. 131, it is mentioned Unit II license. Kindly include the details of factory license for Unit II and provide rationale for how the company is operating without the same in place. Further, provide confirmation whether the issuer has received crucial clearances. Provide revised draft.

On page no. 131, it has been observed that the pictorial chart and the process flow defined below the same are not in line. Kindly review and share the revised draft along with confirmation that the same shall be updated in prospectus
It has been observed that the table provided on page no. 131 is repetitive in nature. Kindly review and remove the same and provide confirmation that the same shall be updated in prospectus
The footnote symbol is not referenced in the table. Kindly reconcile the same. Provide revised draft.

In “Our Business” chapter- It is observed that the Company has made use of superlative words / adjectives like “Experienced”, “comprehensive”, “experienced”, “extensive”, “high-quality”, “leader”, “significant”, “superior”, “trusted” etc. without citing the source and basis of the same as per the instructions mentioned in Schedule VI of the SEBI (ICDR) Regulations 2018 in relation to forward-looking statements. Kindly provide the source/basis of all such statements/claims. Also include these bases in the Material Documents Chapter available for inspection. If not, kindly review and revise the same. Further, the above mentioned points are merely indicative in nature, the Merchant banker shall vet the offer document and ensure that there are no disclosures which are advertising statements and marketing statement and if there are any it shall be either be drafted in a neutral language or provide a basis for the same or removed, to that end, kindly provide a draft along with a confirmation the same shall be placed at the time of prospectus as applicable

[Critical - Operational] Throughout the Chapter (specifically on Page 145), the disclosure details a "Procurement process" involving "Landi Renzo SpA for kits" and "other required components like empty cylinders are procured from Indian suppliers." It further states "Assembled kits are distributed to authorized distributors and dealers, who, in turn, supply the kits to Retro fitment Centres (RFCs) for vehicle installations." This describes a supply chain for components and distribution of assembled kits. However, the initial statement declares "Our company is neither producing nor processing any products." Clarify the extent of "processing" involved in the assembly of kits and the role of the company in this process, given the detailed description of procurement and distribution of assembled kits. Provide revised draft...
Provide the evidentiary source for the claim 'res clean air for the sensor, leading to accurate' and quantify the basis (market data or citation).
For risk 'oking statements that involve risks and uncertainties. Before deciding to invest in the Equity', provide specific mitigation steps the company has implemented or plans to implement.
